name: Climb to The Stars
description:
Submitted for my first game jam.

Only my 2nd completed game.

Basically, you have 4 lives, you need to use your grappling hook on the green boxes to climb up.  Falling too far will make you lose a life.  Hitting projectiles or falling "balls" will kiss you.  However, you may also fire projectiles with right mouse click.

 A boss will appear every once in awhile, hit him 25 times to kills him.

Plays in windowed mode on your computer

Enjoy
